You Should Pay Attention To Skin Disorder In Summer About

If there is something wrong to wear the jewelry, especially in summer, you would easily get the jewelry related skin disease. Most "Jewelry skin disease" symptoms are skin itching, burning, erythema and peeling in the place where wearing necklaces, rings and other jewelry, more severely, it will cause ulcers, and even trigger asthma. Professional reminds everybody that when you choose a jewelry, you need to make sure if your skin is allergic. Avoid wearing gold-plating or silvering jewelry which can cause dermatitis easily.Courteney Cox Lead You to Gather Most Good-Looking Power Plug Convertor wholesale

Ring syndrome: Wearing a ring all days all years may make finger numb, swollen and aching. Finger skin, muscle, bones sagged into circular freak banded by ring, which would easily distortion of fingers. If the ring is not put off, it will affect the blood circulation or even cause partial necrosis. If you wear the ring for a long time, the skin below the ring is difficult to clean, and bacteria grows, pathogenic micro-organisms will be transmitted.5 Rules You should Break

Earing syndrome: it would be dirty to stab the ear hole in the street. That would cause Clostridium if the tools do not get professional sterilization. Someone puts iron wire or prod into ear hole to prevent it from healing, but it impels diffuse infection. So it is suggested to make the ear hole in professional beauty shop or hospital. Also you should avoid to do that in summer. The skin around ears would get irritation easily without careful protection during summer. In addition, if you wear the earing too early, the skin and earing would get friction, so the skin may possibly fester.

Gold jewellery brings radio disease. A hydrogeine examination instition in New York has made an examination of thousands of gold jewellery, result of which they find there are more than 70 pieces of gold jewellery with radio elements. Some radiative elements often coexist with gold ore. During the process of mining, smelting and manufacturing gold ornaments, inevitablly a few radiative elements residue and mixtures remain. When wearing gold jewelry containing these radioactive elements, the skin in the contact will suffer from the radiation for long period and trigger the radioactive jewelry diseases as radiation cancer for the severe.

Experts say that, in woman gold jewelry usually be weared, there're many k-gold ones except pure golds. They are also delicate and popular with young women. These metal alloys with relatively low price, complex composition and low-level processing techniques, generally contain harmful elements. If you wear such jewelry for a long time, you would get the skin disease. Especially in summer when the temperature is high and body would emerge lots of sweat, the iron would speed up the decomposition process. With the expanded pores on the skin, the poison substance would easily invade into the human body. That would cause many adverse reaction of skin.
